cause.description:
National and international rural farmers are subsidized by our government with food that is so cheaply made that they make no profit from selling it. By making modifications on the current US Farm Act, these farmers can be subsidized with money and resources to create better infrastructure, education and healthcare.
1. Call and email state legislators before legislation in October 2007
2. Rights for all in America and internationally
cause.mission: Get support for the national and international rural farmers of America
cause.name: U.S Farm Act
